docs.snippet: German Chancellor Angela Merkel said EU leaders were still waiting for the final word from U.S. President Donald Trump on whether the United States would apply tariffs to European steel and aluminium, and warned of a firm response if he did.

headline.print_headline: EU Leaders Await Final Word From Trump on Tariffs
headline.main: EU Leaders Await Final Word From Trump on Tariffs

docs.snippet: Did police tell an unarmed black man who they were before shooting him to death in a dark backyard in Sacramento, California? That question is forcing an examination of policies dictating when and how police identify themselves while encountering ...

headline.print_headline: California Police Shooting of Unarmed Black Man Forcing Look at Policies
headline.main: California Police Shooting of Unarmed Black Man Forcing Look at Policies

docs.snippet: The teachers have disregarded their own union leaders’ advice to return to work, opting instead for a showdown with members of the state’s leadership.

headline.print_headline: Frustration of Striking Teachers Was Months in the Making
headline.main: ‘All-In or Nothing’: West Virginia’s Teacher Strike Was Months in the Making

docs.snippet: The small storefront restaurant, run by a family that fled Afghanistan, is one of the most in-demand reservations in Adelaide.

headline.print_headline: Parwana Afghan Kitchen Cooks Rice Worth Swooning Over
headline.main: Parwana Afghan Kitchen Cooks Rice Worth Swooning Over

headline.main: Mac and Cheese Eats Its Vegetables

docs.snippet: Italy's anti-establishment 5-Star Movement and rightist parties are looking to wrap up a deal on who should be appointed as speakers for the new parliament, which opens on Friday after this month's inconclusive elections.

headline.print_headline: Italian Parties Seek Parliamentary Deal; Govt Talks Far Away
headline.main: Italian Parties Seek Parliamentary Deal; Govt Talks Far Away

docs.snippet: A history teacher who was videotaped telling his students that only dumb people join the U.S. military has been fired by the suburban Southern California school district where he has taught for more than 15 years.

headline.print_headline: Teacher Who Called US Military 'Lowest of Low' Is Fired
headline.main: Teacher Who Called US Military 'Lowest of Low' Is Fired

docs.snippet: After changing the fundamental idea of chip design, former academics Dave Patterson and John Hennessy have received “the Nobel Prize of computing.”

headline.print_headline: Chip Design Visionaries Share Turing Award
headline.main: Computer Chip Visionaries Win Turing Award

docs.snippet: The European Union on Wednesday unveiled new plans to make big tech companies pay more taxes in a move that would, if endorsed, hit online U.S. firms like Google and Facebook.

headline.print_headline: EU Unveils New Tax Plans That Could Hit US Tech Giants
headline.main: EU Unveils New Tax Plans That Could Hit US Tech Giants
